div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1671 Demanhur (mod. Damanhûr; anc. (954) Dime-n-Hor = Hermopolis parva), 1896 Burial: 305 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 2000 AR Ptolemy I: tetradr. (Alexander hd./Athena, reduced standard, incl. Svoronos 107- 8, 139, 144, 146, 153, 159, 162, 164-5, 168-9, 170, 174, 177 for a total of 200) Disposition: London 13; Mme Vinga 300; Vienna 14 † Dutilh, JIAN 1898, pp. 153-6 Babelon, Traité I.1, p. 23 Mowat, RN 1906, p. 294 ("aux environs de Damanhour") "Semenood" as Noe 954, not mentioned by Mowat or Dutilh
